changes: Wrapped entire page content with Fragment (<>)</>) to accommodate navigation component
Added MobileBottomNav component to loading state with projectId prop
Added MobileBottomNav component to main render with projectId prop
Adjusted main Box container styling: added pb: 10 for bottom padding to prevent content overlap with fixed navigation
Updated layout structure: added display: flex and flexDirection: column to main container
Updated phase from Testing and Verification to Mobile Bottom Navigation
Updated timestamps for session start and last update
Updated task worktree path from 017-1-2-create-equipmentapprovalsubmission-model to 133-build-field-inspector-mobile-dashboard
Updated all permission paths to reference new task worktree

patterns_discovered.description: Used <> fragment to wrap main content and navigation, allowing sibling components (main Box and MobileBottomNav) to coexist without additional wrapper div
Applied pb: 10 (bottom padding) to main container to prevent content overlap with fixed bottom navigation bar
MobileBottomNav consistently receives projectId prop in both loading and main render states
Added display: flex and flexDirection: column to main container for better vertical content alignment with navigation
Navigation component integrated into both loading skeleton state and main content state for consistent UX

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Bottom Padding Required for Fixed Navigation
gotchas_discovered.description: Fixed bottom navigation requires explicit bottom padding (pb: 10) on main content container to prevent content from being hidden underneath the navigation bar
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Applied pb: 10 styling to Box container

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Fragment Usage for Multiple Root Elements
gotchas_discovered.description: Cannot have multiple root elements without wrapper. Using fragment <> allows main content Box and MobileBottomNav to coexist as siblings
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Wrapped entire component return in fragment

gotchas_discovered.description: Navigation component must be present in all render paths (loading and main state) to maintain consistent UI layout
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Added MobileBottomNav to both loading state and main render

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully integrated MobileBottomNav component into InspectorDashboard page by wrapping content in a fragment, adding the navigation component to both loading and main states, and applying appropriate padding to prevent content overlap
key_accomplishments: MobileBottomNav component properly imported and integrated
Navigation appears in both loading and main render states for consistent UX
Bottom padding applied to prevent content overlap with fixed navigation
Layout structure updated to use flexbox for better alignment
projectId prop correctly passed to MobileBottomNav

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting magic padding value (pb: 10) to a constant or CSS module variable for maintainability across other pages that might use MobileBottomNav
Add visual regression tests to ensure MobileBottomNav doesn't overlap with content and that bottom padding is correctly applied
Apply similar integration pattern to other pages that need MobileBottomNav to ensure consistent navigation implementation across the application
Verify that the 428px max-width and navigation styling work well on various mobile screen sizes and orientations
Ensure fixed bottom navigation is properly accessible to keyboard navigation users and screen readers
